name: Out of Control(s)
description:
PLEASE READ THE DESCRIPTION FOR THE CONTROLS AND GAMEPLAY SUMMARY
Collect skills and equip them to traverse the game.  Instead of having a dedicated hotkey for each skill/item.  Skills/items you collect are equipped over existing keys.  Such as replacing space to jump with space to shoot.  Press E near a chest to activate it as your current checkpoint and manage or inventory.  Left Click selects a skill in inventory mode and Right Click reverts a selection.  E closes the inventory.  W,A,S,D are used for navigating the inventory.  Press C to go back to the last chest you interacted with.  Inputs that can be assigned skills, W, A, S, D, SPACE, Left Click. Tip:  Try to find the key and then enter the big door.  F4 toggles fullscreen.  Alt restarts the game at any time.
